2088.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|79|46$مَنَعَنَآ|stopped Us|94|108|10418$أَن|that|48|62|655$نُّرْسِلَ|We send|77|91|10419$بِٱلْأَيَـٰتِ|the Signs|87|101|10420$إِلَّآ|except|65|79|86$أَن|that|48|62|655$كَذَّبَ|denied|67|81|5487$بِهَا|them|53|60|1203$ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ‌ۚ|the former (people)|149|166|7858$وَءَاتَيْنَا|And We gave|108|143|830$ثَمُودَ|Thamud|72|107|6535$ٱلنَّاقَةَ|the she-camel|115|150|6557$مُبْصِرَةً|(as) a visible sign,|141|158|10257$فَظَلَمُواْ|but they wronged|138|162|6652$بِهَا‌ۚ|her.|46|94|1203$وَمَا|And not|72|120|46$نُرْسِلُ|We send|77|125|5606$بِٱلْأَيَـٰتِ|the Signs|87|135|10420$إِلَّا|except|65|89|86$تَخْوِيفًا|(as) a warning.|121|121|10421$

2089.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|93|308$قُلْنَا|We said|72|88|356$لَكَ|to you,|68|84|323$إِنَّ|"Indeed,|75|91|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|98|586$أَحَاطَ|has encompassed|137|153|10422$بِٱلنَّاسِ‌ۚ|the mankind."|110|118|1292$وَمَا|And not|72|84|46$جَعَلْنَا|We made|81|106|1137$ٱلرُّءْيَا|the vision|84|108|10423$ٱلَّتِىٓ|which|61|86|232$أَرَيْنَـٰكَ|We showed you|125|150|10424$إِلَّا|except|65|90|86$فِتْنَةً|(as) a trial|90|102|7216$لِّلنَّاسِ|for mankind,|101|111|787$وَٱلشَّجَرَةَ|and the tree|107|126|10425$ٱلْمَلْعُونَةَ|the accursed|107|126|10426$فِى|in|48|67|89$ٱلْقُرْءَانِ‌ۚ|the Quran.|95|114|10369$وَنُخَوِّفُهُمْ|And We threaten them|171|181|10427$فَمَا|but not|69|94|132$يَزِيدُهُمْ|it increases them|134|184|10371$إِلَّا|except|65|115|86$طُغْيَـٰنًا|(in) transgression|136|186|5111$كَبِيرًا|great.|72|97|2548$

2090.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|98|308$قُلْنَا|We said|72|98|356$لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ|to the Angels,|114|140|311$ٱسْجُدُواْ|"Prostrate|93|119|357$لِأَدَمَ|to Adam."|85|111|358$فَسَجَدُوٓاْ|So they prostrated|146|159|359$إِلَّآ|except|65|81|86$إِبْلِيسَ|Iblis.|76|108|360$قَالَ|He said,|73|105|309$ءَأَسْجُدُ|"Shall I prostrate|132|164|10428$لِمَنْ|to (one) whom|118|150|1356$خَلَقْتَ|You created|101|117|3608$طِينًا|(from) clay?"|105|105|10429$

2091.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|85|309$أَرَءَيْتَكَ|"Do You see|100|123|10430$هَـٰذَا|this|59|82|248$ٱلَّذِى|whom|65|88|138$كَرَّمْتَ|You have honored,|145|168|10431$عَلَىَّ|above me?|91|114|4174$لَئِنْ|If|52|64|4795$أَخَّرْتَنِ|You give me respite|151|166|10432$إِلَىٰ|till|53|84|118$يَوْمِ|(the) Day|84|115|10$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection,|164|195|820$لَأَحْتَنِكَنَّ|I will surely destroy|149|164|10433$ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ|his offspring|100|211|10434$إِلَّا|except|65|286|86$قَلِيلاً|a few."|67|178|433$

2093.verse: وَٱسْتَفْزِزْ|And incite|106|117|10438$مَنِ|whoever|76|98|1673$ٱسْتَطَعْتَ|you can|107|129|5549$مِنْهُم|among them|101|123|730$بِصَوْتِكَ|with your voice,|127|149|10439$وَأَجْلِبْ|and assault|96|107|10440$عَلَيْهِم|[on] them|86|99|22$بِخَيْلِكَ|with your cavalry|135|162|10441$وَرَجِلِكَ|and infantry|100|127|10442$وَشَارِكْهُمْ|and be a partner|131|158|10443$فِى|in|48|75|89$ٱلْأَمْوَٲلِ|the wealth|91|104|1367$وَٱلْأَوْلَـٰدِ|and the children,|132|141|10444$وَعِدْهُمْ‌ۚ|and promise them."|147|165|10445$وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$يَعِدُهُمُ|promises them|115|133|4482$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan|105|123|379$إِلَّا|except|65|74|86$غُرُورًا|delusion.|90|90|4483$

2094.verse: إِنَّ|"Indeed,|75|85|58$عِبَادِى|My slaves|85|106|1611$لَيْسَ|not|61|82|1763$لَكَ|for you|67|88|323$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them|87|108|22$سُلْطَـٰنٌ‌ۚ|any authority.|114|135|9780$وَكَفَىٰ|And sufficient|111|121|4038$بِرَبِّكَ|(is) your Lord|109|326|10281$وَكِيلاً|(as) a Guardian."|132|349|4237$

2088.verse: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning.

2089.verse: And [remember, O Muhammad], when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree [mentioned] in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression.

2090.verse: And [mention] when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay?"

2091.verse: [Iblees] said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few."

2092.verse: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense.

2093.verse: And incite [to senselessness] whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion.

2094.verse: Indeed, over My [believing] servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs.

2095.verse: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful.
